attributes.action: GET BRITAIN OUT OF THE EU
attributes.background:
Fairer Immigration – The EU opens British borders to 450 million Europeans

We have no control over the number of people who come into Britain. They are all entitled to British taxpayer funded benefit payments, healthcare and education.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105863

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
